price: To Him belong the sailing ships raised up in the sea like mountains.
arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡجَوَارِ ٱلۡمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
